johnny
Class JohnnyBank

java.lang.Object
  johnny.JohnnyBank

public class JohnnyBank
extends java.lang.Object

The bank and account with which one or more Johnny Cards can be associated.

Author:
Liam McManus, Alan Cooke

Method Detail

verifyPin

public final boolean verifyPin(int[] pinEntered)
Verify the pin associated with the JohnnyBank. There is one Pin number associated with each JohnnyBank.

Parameters:
pinEntered - the pin entered by the user
Returns:
Is this pin correct?

Returns:

Get the current daily total used.

Returns:

public final void updateBankBalance(int amount)
Update this Johnny Bank with this amount.

Parameters:
